title.narrative: Institutional strengthening and policy support to upgrade the component manufacturers in the automotive sector in the Republic of Belarus (Phase II)

description.narrative: The overall objective of this project is to broaden and deepen in a sustainable way the scope and outreach of already established programme services (implemented in the predecessor project in 2014-2017), and to further strengthen Belorussian automotive component suppliers to meet the requirements of OEMs and Tier-l manufacturers. Within this context, the project envisages to support and strengthen the institutional framework for providing practical services to suppliers in the industry sector concerned, achieving the following goals: 1. Enhancing the performance of participating suppliers in the automotive component industry. 2. Upgrading the relevant support institutions.
